title: Blue Lizard BABY Mineral Sunscreen Stick with Zinc Oxide, SPF 50+, Water Resistant, UVA/UVB Protection - Easy to apply, Fragrance Free, .5 oz
description: Spf without the mess. Blue Lizard Mineral baby Sunscreen stick offers broad spectrum UVA/UVB SPF 50+ protection in an easy-to-carry and easy-to-apply formula. This non-tinted solid sunscreen glides on easily, rubs in clear and dries smooth, not sticky. Made with Aloe Vera, Shea butter, Sunflower Seed Oil and Vitamin E to naturally nourish baby's skin while the mineral zinc oxide protects it from the sun. 100% vegan with no parabens, No fragrances and no chemical active ingredients This sunscreen is ideal for baby's delicate skin.
